entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rainshower, 5.8°C

Observed at: Mont-Joli Airport 4:00 PM EDT Sunday 15 May 2016

Visibility: 4.8 km
Humidity: 98 %

entry.title: Sunday night: Rain. Low 6.
entry.summary: Rain. Snow inland overnight. Fog patches developing overnight. Rainfall amount 15 to 25 mm. Snowfall amount 4 cm inland. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low 6. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Sunday 15 May 2016
